type.description:
apoli:enchantment
Checks the level of a certain enchantment on the item.
Item Condition Types operate on an ItemStack. These are available to power/condition types that provides an item_condition object field.
type.markdownDescription:
### `apoli:enchantment`
Checks the level of a certain enchantment on the item.
## Item Condition Type
Item Condition Types operate on an ItemStack. These are available to power/condition types that provides an item_condition object field.

[Item Condition Types Documentation](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_Condition_types/)

enchantment.description: ID of the enchantment of interest, e.g. minecraft:protection.

comparison.description: How to compare the enchantment level the specified value.

compare_to.description: Which value to compare the enchantment level against.
